Title: [03] Unnecessary usage of `init()`
Content:
Since `Core` contract does not go through a proxy, and the caller of `init()` is the same as the deployer in deploy script, it is unnecessary to use init functions. ### Proof of Concept [Core.sol#L20](https://github.com/code-423n4/2022-03-volt/blob/main/contracts/core/Core.sol#L20)
### Recommended Mitigation Steps Consider putting `init()` logic into `constructor` instead and stop inheriting Initializable.
